hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Nayru's Love#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hidden Ceiling Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Never give up. Trust your instincts!

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Forest Temple Compass#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that Sheik waits in the #Death Mountain Crater# to teach #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #the Stone of Agony#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Kokiri Sword#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Ruto's Letter# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Bottom of the Well Compass#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Bug Bottle#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #3 Deku Scrubs#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Kokiri Sword#.

LW (Bridge).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##the Market## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #a Blue Rupee#.

Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room
